title: Ray of Frost
content:

Evocation Cantrip

Reduce the target's movement speed by 3m.

Ray of Frost is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Ray of Frost is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Ray of Frost Information

Description: Reduce the target's movement speed by 3m. Level: Cantrip School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

Ray of Frost Tips & Notes

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8) and 10th level (3d8). A target with the Wet status is vulnerable to cold/lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell. If cast at a target standing in a Water/Blood Surface, the surface will become an Ice Surface (half move, save or Prone). The verbal component has the caster saying "Glacius", Latin for "ice".
